pages.text: Most raw fish in the Aquaculture mod cannot be eaten directly or cooked as-is. They need to be processed first before they can be used as proper ingredients, and obtaining $(thing)fish fillet$() is the essential first step.

To get $(thing)fish fillet$(), simply place any type of $(thing)knife$() together with $(thing)raw fish$() in a shapeless recipe. This will yield $(thing)fish fillet$(), which can then be used in various cooking recipes.

Larger fish that produce more fillets will also yield more $(thing)fish bones$() when processed. Fish bones can be crafted into $(thing)bone meal$() for fertilizer, or used as ingredients in other recipes.

Big fish may also contain odd or unexpected items inside their bodies. Among these, the most valuable is the $(thing)Neptunian Pearl$(), an essential material used for forging $(thing)Neptunian Steel$().
